short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify ownership for real estate listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HomeCheck
Your trusted tool for verifying property ownership.

HomeCheck is a browser extension designed to bring transparency and security to the online real estate experience. Whether youâ€™re a renter searching for your next home or a property owner listing your property, HomeCheck ensures peace of mind by verifying property ownership.

Key Features:
Renter Mode: Instantly check if a property listing is verified by the actual owner. Avoid scams and make informed decisions.
Owner Mode: Easily verify your property by uploading your deed and identification. Build trust with potential renters.
Firebase-Powered Security: All verification data is securely stored and managed for reliable performance.
User-Friendly Interface: Navigate with ease in a clean, intuitive interface that works seamlessly on major real estate platforms like Apartments.com and Homes.com.
Ad Integration: Get access to helpful services for moving, insurance, and real estate professionals.
HomeCheck is your all-in-one solution for secure and credible property transactions. Ensure trust and safety in every rental decision with HomeCheck.
